籤詩版本二:
Hoʻomaha iki nā hopohopo a me nā hopohopo, a hele mai ka hauʻoli mai ka lani.
E like me ka jade huna ʻia i loko o ka lepo, hoʻāla ka mea hana maikaʻi i ka lepo
詩意:
Hōʻike kēia hexagram i ka lokahi o Yin a me Yang.
Pono nā mea a pau āu e hoʻolālā ai.
解曰: ʻAʻohe mea i loaʻa, ʻaʻohe mea i nalowale. Loaʻa mai ka poho. Pilikia ka mea ino. Laki maikaʻi iā ʻoe, e ke kāne.
籤詩故事一:
◇Ye Meng Xiong Chao Di
ʻO Ye Mengxiong (1531-1597), ʻo Nanzhao kona inoa aloha a ʻo Longtang kona inoa, ua hoʻololi ʻia iā Longtan a ʻo Huayun kekahi. He kamaaina no Wanshifang, Huizhou Fucheng (i kēia manawa he hapa o ka Apana Huicheng, Huizhou City) i ka Ming Dynasty. I ka makahiki 44 o Jiajing noho aliʻi (1565), ua lilo ʻo ia i Jinshi a ua loaʻa iā ia ka inoa o ka luna kānāwai o Qing County. Ua lawelawe ʻo ia ma ke ʻano he alakaʻi o ke keʻena hoʻololi, a ma hope ua hoʻololi ʻo ia i ka censor supervisory o Shanxi Road.
I ka makahiki 20 o Wanli (1592), ua pepehi ke Kanikela Nui o Ningxia, Kuaibai (ke poʻo o ka ʻohana Mongolian Tatar), i ke kiaʻāina ʻo Dang Xin a hoʻopio i ka pā kaua kanahākūmāhiku ma ka moku ʻo Hexi. , wāwahi i ke kūlanakauhale, hoʻomana a puhi i ke ahi ia ia iho i ka make. ʻAʻole hoʻokiʻekiʻe ʻo Meng Xiong i ka lawe ʻana i ka hōʻaiʻē, a ua ʻae ʻo ia i kona akamai e like me ka maikaʻi o nā pūkaua e aʻa nei e hakakā. Ua hoʻihoʻi hou ʻia ka mana Wei Xuezeng. I kona mau makahiki hope, ua haʻalele ʻo ia i ʻelima mau manawa a hoʻihoʻi ʻia i Huizhou e kūkulu i ka luakini ʻo Huilong.
Ua komo ʻo Ye Mengxiong i ka Taoism ma ke ʻano he kanaka kīwila i ka hoʻomaka ʻana a ua kaulana ʻo ia no kona ʻoiaʻiʻo a me kona kūpaʻa. He kūpaʻa loa, he wiwo ʻole, he wiwo ʻole, a he akamai i ka pū. I ka hapa lua o kona ola, ua hoʻopaʻa ʻia kāna mau mākau martial arts ma ka "History of the Ming Dynasty" a ua manaʻo ʻia ʻo ia he meʻe aupuni.
聖意: ʻAʻole maikaʻi ka home (ʻoi aʻe ka maluhia) He maikaʻi ke kau a me ka hoʻoilo iā ia iho, e kūleʻa ka waiwai, e kūleʻa nā kālepa, e kūleʻa ka male, e hoʻoweliweli ʻia ʻo Liujia (e loaʻa nā waiwai), e hele ka poʻe hele wāwae i ke kula. pule no na enuhe silika, eono holoholona e palahalaha, e loaa na kanaka, e pono ole ana na hoopii lehulehu, e malama pono ka hele ana, e keakea ka waiwai nalowale, e hooponoponoia na ma'i iloko o ka lua kupapau o Fushan.
